Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Phrase \Phrase\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Phrased}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Phrasing}.] [Cf. F. phraser.] To express in words, or in peculiar words; to call; to style. ``These suns -- for so they phrase 'em.'' --Shak. [1913 Webster]
